name: Resurrace Rebellion
description:
The rebel, Resurrace, has arrived at last.
Control Evolvace E3O which is customized by you and destroy Resurrace.
Marvelos large battleship hyper 3D shooting game.

In addition to Resurrace and Evolserk, new Evolvaces, Resurrace Evolvaces, appear.
Annihilate enemies with enormous offensive power by your own E3O.

Complete the strongest E3O by combining Guardace's powerful energy generators and weapons.

Combine 3 generators at your own will.
Superconductive Space Energy Generator.
Anti-matter Energy Generator
Dark-matter Energy Generator

Combine various kinds of weapons in correspondence with the generator.
Set the energy consumption rate of every weapon.

Select one of 6 Remz systems.

Over tens of millions of combinations.
The best battleship customization 3D shooting.

What is the destination of Resurrace and E3O?
